name: Balancer GHO-LUSD Stable Pool
description: This token represents a Balancer Stable liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pools, and can also deposit the LP to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This pool contains GHO and LUSD. GHO is AAVE's overcollateralized stablecoin and LUSD is Liquity's overcollateralized stablecoin.
